function:
function() -- Global variables Counter = -1 FirstSinceFmt = true CurrentDate = sa.ldate("%d",date) CurrentMonth = sa.ldate("%m",date) CurrentYear = sa.ldate("%Y",date) CurrentShift = "" Model1="" Model2="" Model3="" Model4="" Model5="" Model6="" Model7="" Model8="" Model1Counter=0 Model2Counter=0 Model3Counter=0 Model4Counter=0 Model5Counter=0 Model6Counter=0 Model7Counter=0 Model8Counter=0
if H >= 6 and H < 14 then CurrentShift = "A" elseif H >= 14 and H < 22 then CurrentShift = "B" else CurrentShift = "C" end end
